name: throatiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a sound or voice) the quality of being low and rough: She has lost the trademark throatiness of her voice. Throatiness is due to constriction at the base of the tongue. See
throaty
More examplesFewer examplesPoor breathing is the chief cause of throatiness."You're joking?" she said with her distinctive throatiness.I kept thinking that the throatiness in her voice was quite pleasing.
